items.q: What penetration testing areas can this coach cover?
items.a: Web, mobile, network, wireless, and Active Directory. Includes reporting, methodology, and tools.

items.q: Does the coach teach hands-on labs?
items.a: Yes. Uses platforms like PortSwigger, TryHackMe, Hack The Box and custom vulnerable labs.
Burp Suite, OWASP ZAP, Nmap, SQLMap, Metasploit, Wireshark; Windows/Linux environments and VMs.
